EmailTemplate.name: Marija Milenkovic test link.11-?-20 RET First Digital Publications Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: How Much of the $600 Billion Last Year Did You Take In?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We hope the infographic sponsored by Convenience Store News gave you some good insight—like how you may have missed out on some of the $648 billion c-stores made last year and what top obstacles stand in your way for the next three years. Contact us to learn how NCR’s Software Defined Store <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/software-defined-store]]> can help you meet one of your largest challenges: engaging and keeping loyal customers.
No pitches. Just chats.
Want to learn more? An NCR sales rep will get right back to you to schedule a call. <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/software-defined-store/thank-you]]>
